actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide a remedy in the nature of mandamus to be applied against the Attorney General upon the application of any person to require the investigation of certain alleged criminal offenses, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides a remedy in the nature of mandamus to be applied against the Attorney General, upon the application of any person, to require the investigation of specified alleged criminal offenses. (Adds 28 U.S.C. 527)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide a remedy in the nature of mandamus to be applied against the Attorney General upon the application of any person to require the investigation of certain alleged criminal offenses, and for other purposes.
